c1.name: A Cold Blade Like a Shadow
c1.descriptionRaw: When <color=#FFD780FF>Enigmatic Feint</color>'s Enigma Thrust hits an opponent with Shadowsign, a vortex will be created at that opponent's position that will pull nearby opponents in.
c1.description: When Enigmatic Feint's Enigma Thrust hits an opponent with Shadowsign, a vortex will be created at that opponent's position that will pull nearby opponents in.

c2.name: Endless Mysteries
c2.descriptionRaw: Whenever the Bogglecat Box summoned by <color=#FFD780FF>Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift</color> fires a Vivid Shot, it will fire an extra Vivid Shot.
c2.description: Whenever the Bogglecat Box summoned by Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift fires a Vivid Shot, it will fire an extra Vivid Shot.

c3.name: Cognition-Inverting Gaze
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Obscuring Ambiguity
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Enigmatic Feint</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Enigmatic Feint by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Watchful Eye
c6.descriptionRaw: When Lynette uses <color=#FFD780FF>Enigmatic Feint</color>'s Enigma Thrust, she will gain an <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo Infusion</color> and 20% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> for 6s.
c6.description: When Lynette uses Enigmatic Feint's Enigma Thrust, she will gain an Anemo Infusion and 20% Anemo DMG Bonus for 6s.
